data.SOURCE:
@AbapCatalog.viewEnhancementCategory: [#NONE]
@AccessControl.authorizationCheck: #NOT_REQUIRED
@EndUserText.label: 'Weight ticket Item'
@Metadata.ignorePropagatedAnnotations: true
@ObjectModel.usageType:{
    serviceQuality: #X,
    sizeCategory: #S,
    dataClass: #MIXED
}
define view entity ZPR_I_ITEM
  as select from zpr_tb_wt_it as Item
  composition [0..*] of zpr_i_item_tote     as _Tote
  association        to parent ZPR_I_HEADER as _Header   on  $projection.Werks  = _Header.Werks
                                                         and $projection.Wtktno = _Header.Wtktno
  association [0..*] to ZPR_I_DOCU_LOG      as _Doculog  on  $projection.Wtktno  = _Doculog.wtktno
                                                         and $projection.Wtktitm = _Doculog.wtktitem

  association [0..1] to I_Supplier          as _Vendor   on  $projection.Supplier = _Vendor.Supplier
  association [0..1] to ZPR_I_MATERIAL      as _Material on  $projection.Matnr  = _Material.Material
                                                         and _Material.Language = $session.system_language
  association [0..*] to ZPR_I_POCOND        as _Pocond   on  $projection.Ebeln = _Pocond.PurchaseOrder

  association [0..1] to I_StorageLocation   as _Sloc     on  $projection.Lgort = _Sloc.StorageLocation
                                                         and $projection.Werks = _Sloc.Plant
  association [0..1] to ZPR_I_UOM         as _Measure on  $projection.Unit = _Measure.Measure
                                                      and _Measure.Language      = $session.system_language


{
  key Item.werks                 as Werks,
  key Item.wtktno                as Wtktno,
  key Item.wtktitm               as Wtktitm,
      Item.prueflos              as Prueflos,
      Item.charg                 as Charg,
      Item.ebeln                 as Ebeln,
      Item.ebelp                 as ebelp,
      Item.mblnr                 as Mblnr,
      Item.mjahr                 as Mjahr,
      Item.invoice               as Invoice,
      Item.invoice_split1        as SplitInvoice1,
      Item.invoice_split2        as SplitInvoice2,
      Item.invoice_split3        as SplitInvoice3,
      Item.gross_weight          as GrossWeight,
      Item.tare_weight           as TareWeight,
      Item.weight                as Weight,
      Item.unit                  as Unit,
      Item.ernam                 as Ernam,
      Item.erdat                 as Erdat,
      Item.ereit                 as Ereit,
      Item.aenam                 as Aenam,
      Item.aedat                 as Aedat,
      Item.aeeit                 as Aeeit,
      Item.supplier              as Supplier,
      Item.agreement             as Agreement,
      Item.matnr                 as Matnr,
      Item.collection_point      as Collection_Point,
      Item.lgort                 as Lgort,
      po_price                   as PoPrice,
//      Item.itm_field2            as ItmField2,
      Item.receipt_type          as ReceiptType,
      case  Item.status
       when '10' then 'Created'
       when '20' then 'Transaction Posted'
       when '30' then 'Results Record Completed'
       when '40' then 'Usage Decision Completed'
       when '50' then 'Price Updated'
       when '60' then 'Invoiced'
       else 'Created'
       end                       as status,
      Item.comments              as Comments,
      Item.rocancel              as Rocancel,
      /*      _Sloc.StorageLocationName as SlocName,
            _Vendor.SupplierFullName as SupplierName,
            _Material.MatName as MaterialName, */
      _Pocond,
      _Sloc,
      _Doculog,
      _Vendor,
      _Material.MatName          as MaterialName,
      _Material,
      _Header,
      _Tote,
      _Measure.MeasureName as MName
}
/*+[internal] {
"BASEINFO":
{
"FROM":
[
"ZPR_I_MATERIAL",
"ZPR_I_UOM",
"ZPR_TB_WT_IT"
],
"ASSOCIATED":
[

"I_SUPPLIER",
"ZPR_I_DOCU_LOG",
"ZPR_I_HEADER",
"ZPR_I_ITEM_TOTE",
"ZPR_I_MATERIAL",
"ZPR_I_POCOND"
],
"BASE":
[],
"ANNO_REF":
[],
"SCALAR_FUNCTION":
[],
"VERSION":0,
"ANNOREF_EVALUATION_ERROR":""
}
}*/
